name: We Become What We Behold Android
name_original: We Become What We Behold Android
description:
An Android port of Nicky Case's original game!

See it here! https://ncase.itch.io/wbwwb

WE BECOME WHAT WE BEHOLD a game about news cycles, vicious cycles, infinite cycles

This silly game by Nicky Case was ported by me, Johnsen Magsino, in five hours!

Ported using Java and Android Studio.
